alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:24PM CDT until May 06 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR CLAY...NORTHERN NUCKOLLS...WESTERN FILLMORE AND NORTHWESTERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Deweese, or 19 miles southeast of Hastings, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Edgar around 840 PM CDT. Oak around 845 PM CDT. Ong around 850 PM CDT. Davenport around 855 PM CDT. Shickley around 900 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
